Article: CONSTRUCTION - 30B Bechtelbuilt nuclear plant starts operation in Georgia
Author: Matthew Thibault, Associate Editor
Summary: contractor The Reston Virginiabased contractor was brought onto the project in 2017 according to the contractor The reston Virginiabased contractor was brought onto the project in 2017 the project has an estimated cost of more than 30 billion per the Associated Press the unit is projected to be in service during the late fourth quarter of this year or the first quarter of 2024

Article: CONSTRUCTION - Enrollment funding supply chain issues throw wrench into school construction projects
Author: Naaz Modan, Senior Reporter
Summary: schools are reconsidering their projects due to supply chain delays running into federal obligation deadlines many districts are competing with one another to complete similar pandemic construction projects nationwide driving up costs of contracting services but contractors are also having to increase wages
